summary: Build a petition web page for a letter addressed to Louis Vuitton, allowing users to sign with first name, last name, and area code.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- High-contrast abstract “chaos” editorial banner artwork with subtle texture, black/white/neutral palette (petition-banner.dim_1600x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a public petition page that displays the full petition letter content exactly as provided (including the subject line and the referenced Louis Vuitton URL) in a readable, well-formatted layout.
Add a signature form to the petition page that collects First name, Last name, and Area code, with client-side validation and clear error messages in English.
Connect the frontend signature form to the backend so users can submit signatures and see the live-updated total count and a recent-signers list.

Apply a coherent visual theme appropriate for a bold, editorial-style petition (high-contrast neutrals, magazine-like typography, strong spacing) and use it consistently across the petition text and signing components.
Generate and include required static image assets in the frontend and render them on the petition page as part of the visual theme (served from frontend/public/assets/generated).

new_feature_requests.summary: Petition page displaying the provided petition text (Subject: Strength in Numbers...) addressed to Louis Vuitton
Signature form to sign the petition with first name, last name, and area code

Implement backend persistence for petition signatures with fields: firstName, lastName, areaCode, and createdAt timestamp; expose query and update methods for creating a signature and retrieving signatures and total count.
